word_mean: 杓状的：形状象杓的，如杓状软骨的

sentence.Network_en: Objective To improve the diagnosis and treatment of arytenoid subluxation ( AS ) following endotracheal intubation.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的提高对气管插管后环杓关节半脱位 ( AS ) 诊断和治疗的认识.

sentence.Network_en: Our aim was to discuss the cause of laryngeal paralysis and the effect of arytenoid adduction.
sentence.Network_cn: 探讨喉麻痹的原因和杓状软骨内移术的手术效果.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion Subtotal laryngectomy with preservation of arytenoid cartilage is recommended for T 3 laryngeal cancer.
sentence.Network_cn: 手术的关键是不能损伤杓状软骨及喉返神经,设计好环咽吻合方案.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from modern Latin arytaenoides, from Greek arutainoeidēs, from arutaina 'funnel'

means.word_mean: 1. either of two small cartilages at the back of the larynx to which the vocal folds are attached
